Data Fields
device_spi_cfg_t Struct Reference
Device Configuration

Data structure for a SPI device with a CS pin. More...

#include <device.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_spi_cfg_t:

Detailed Description

This data structure defines the data used to implement a device driver which utilizes the SPI port and a single GPIO pin for the chip select.

Data Fields

pio_t cs
 The chip select gpio port/pin.
 
uint8_t width
 The width of a SPI bus word.
 
uint8_t format
 The format the SPI bus uses.
 
uint8_t mode
 The SPI mode (0, 1, 2, or 3)
